sections.content: Make yourself comfortable, and find a quiet space.
sections.heading: Step 1

sections.content: The next screen will show you a short paragraph to read aloud. The app will record your voice while you do so.
sections.heading: Part 2

sections.content:
Go placidly amid the noise and haste, and remember what peace there may be in silence.
  As far as possible, without surrender, be on good terms with all persons.
  Speak your truth quietly and clearly; and listen to others,
  even to the dull and ignorant; they too have their story.
sections.heading: P1

sections.content:
Avoid loud and aggressive persons, they are vexations to the spirit.
        If you compare yourself with others, you may become vain and bitter,
        for always there will be greater and lesser persons than yourself.
        Enjoy your achievements as well as your plans.
sections.heading: P2
P3
